I'd prefer if you send me on Stake via Tip, but first, let's find out if it can be filled.Loan Amount: 0.001 BTCRepayment amount: 0.0012 BTCLoan Duration: 1 weeksNeed Via: Stake.com Tip functionCurrency: BTCRepayment: in 7 days (Most likely by tomorrow)
